Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [Studies on characteristics of absorption and separation of traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription by macroporous resin].

AbstractText: Study the characteristics of absorption and separation of traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription using macroporous resin.

Study the techniquecs and characteristics of absorption and separation of a sample by macroporous resin, which is composed of coptis root, rhubarb and common anemarrhena rhizome, containing alkaloid, anthraquinone and saponin.

It is proved by qualitative and quantitative researches studies that after absorbed and separated by optimized technics process, most prime effective components or section fractions in traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription can be reserved maintained.

If the techniquecs of separation is properly designed, the same kind of macropore resin can absorbd and separate various effective components or section in traditional Chinese medicine compound prescription which have with different chemical structures efficiently.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: West China School of Pharmacy, Sichuan University, Chengdu.
